quests.name: Thaw the Frozen Citadel
quests.description: Embark on a quest to thaw the 'Frozen Citadel' and uncover the ancient secrets locked within its icy halls. Face 'Frost Guardians' and 'Icebound Sentinels' as you seek the 'Heart of Winter.'

quests.name: Face the Guardian of Frost
quests.description: Challenge the 'Guardian of Frost,' a formidable guardian protecting the inner sanctum of the 'Frozen Citadel.' Defeat 'Frostbane' in an epic battle to claim its 'Frostforged Blade.'

quests.name: Seeking Lost Artifacts
quests.description: Scour the depths of the 'Frozen Citadel' for 'Lost Artifacts' buried within the ice. Beware of 'Ancient Ice Elementals' and retrieve valuable relics to uncover their history.

quests.name: The Specter's Plight
quests.description: Assist a tormented 'Specter' within the citadel's frozen halls. Uncover the 'Specter's Past' and put their soul to rest. Face 'Echoes of Regret' and find the 'Frozen Soulstone.'

quests.name: Rituals of the Frost Warden
quests.description: Investigate the 'Rituals of the Frost Warden' performed by cultists within the citadel. Confront 'Frost Cultists' and disrupt their dark rites. Retrieve 'Frost Ward Totems' to end their rituals.
